TextView.android:text: Hyatt Place is the perfect starting point for a spiritual visit to Rameswaram. Relax after a long day in our spacious guestrooms, rest up, then wake up and experience our free Gallery kitchen breakfast. Work out while you are away from home at our 24/7 StayFit gym, while the kids keep busy in the outdoor pool. Our ideal location makes it easy to get to Ramanathaswamy Temple and other religious and historical sites.

Daiwik Hotels, Rameswaram is a full service mid segment hotel with all modern amenities for a discerning traveler. The Rameshwaram hotel offers, 90 generously sized, well-appointed rooms in three categories, Superior, Deluxe and Suite. The design of the Rameswaram hotel takes inspiration from the intangible spirit of temple design. It is rated one of the best hotels in Rameswaram for food and hospitality. Amongst the hotels in Rameshwaram near the temple, Daiwik Hotel is located just 3 kms away from the Ramanathaswamy temple. Book room with best tariff. The hotel has increased level of hygiene and sanitising standards implemented as per the Government’s instructions and World health Organisation’s (WHO) directives to ensure the safety of our guests, our staff and the community at large.

Hotel Arjunaa welcomes you to the God’s Own Island City Rameswaram. Hotel Arjunaa is a more Spacious and Luxurious Hotel in Rameswaram, located at main temple road highway. Which connects major places of the city, 900m to main temple, 200m to main bus stand and 1.3k to Rameswaram railway Station. Hotel Arjunaa started welcoming the guests from 20th may 2018. Hotel Arjunaa provides 43 well-appointed Luxurious Comfort Rooms to the guests, can accommodate 150 Guests. To make Your Stay More Luxurious Comfort, Hotel Arjunaa offers various types of rooms like Executive Double, Executive Twin, Premium Family rooms and King Suites. Our rooms are well equipped with modern amenities centralized Air Conditioning, satellite TV channels, electric Kettle, 40 inch Flat LED screen, Intercom, unlimited free Wi-Fi, modern equipped bathrooms, minibar and etc. Our Shree Ram multicuisine Restaurants offers pure vegetarian healthy and tasty food recipes. Shree Ram restaurant using handpicked organic vegetables from our own Vegetable Garden and RO Water to prepare more delicious food recipes for the guests. The people of Hotel Arjunaa provides International standard hospitality, who will make your experience truly exceptional.
